\begin{question}
Explain each of the following examples, and correct any
problems you detect.
\begin{enumerate}[label=(\alph*)]
^^I\item \verb|while (string::iterator iter != s.end()) { /* . . . */ }|
^^I\item \verb|while (bool status = find(word)) { /* . . . */ }|\\
\verb|if (!status) { /* . . . */ }|
\end{enumerate}
\end{question}
